articles.title: New leak says it's not just the Galaxy S25 Ultra's corners that are getting rounded - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung could offer a redesigned frame on the Galaxy S25 Ultra that might make the device more comfortable to hold.
articles.content:
• A new leak claims that the Galaxy S25 Ultra will feature a new frame design.
  • The frame will reportedly be rounded towards the back panel and straight on the display side.
